Detailed Description

Base class for all image exporters.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzImageExporter::DzImageExporter ( const QString &  extension  ) 

Constructor. Creates a new image exporter. This is usually only called by the constructors of child classes to set the extension they support.

Parameters:
extension The file extension (type) that this exporter saves to.
DzImageExporter::~DzImageExporter (  )  [virtual]

Destructor.

Member Function Documentation

QString DzImageExporter::getDescription (  )  const [pure virtual, slot]
Returns:
A description of the exporter that can be placed in a file type selection combo box (e.g. "JPEG Format")
QString DzImageExporter::getExtension (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The extension that this exporter will force filenames to.
The file extension of the file type that the exporter writes (excluding the preceeding '.').
bool DzImageExporter::isFileExporter (  )  const [pure virtual, slot]
Returns:
true if this exporter writes to a 'real' file. Derived classes should override this to indicate whether or not they are writing out to a real file. Exporters can, if they want to, write to entities other than files (e.g. sockets, pipes, etc.)

const QImage &  image,
const DzFileIOSettings *  options 
) [slot]

Writes the file.

Parameters:
filename The name of the file to save the image to.
image Image to save to file.
options The options for the exporter.
Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR on success, otherwise an error code.
